Name: BLOG_COMMENT_STORE_OWNER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. New blog comment.
Body:
%stores.name%




A new blog comment has been created for blog post "%blog_comments.BlogPostTitle%".

Name: BACK_IN_STOCK_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. Back in stock notification
Body:
%stores.name%




Hello %customers.first_name% %customers.last_name%,


Product %back_in_stock_subscriptions.ProductName% is in stock.

Name: CUSTOMER_EMAIL_VALIDATION_MESSAGE
Subject: %stores.name%. Email validation
Body:
%stores.name%




To activate your account click here.




%stores.name%

Name: CUSTOMER_EMAIL_REVALIDATION_MESSAGE
Subject: %stores.name%. Email validation
Body:
%stores.name%




Hello %customers.first_name% %customers.last_name%!


To validate your new email address click here.




%stores.name%

Name: PRIVATE_MESSAGE_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. You have received a new private message
Body:
%stores.name%




You have received a new private message.

Name: CUSTOMER_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_MESSAGE
Subject: %stores.name%. Password recovery
Body:
%stores.name%




To change your password click here.




%stores.name%

Name: CUSTOMER_WELCOME_MESSAGE
Subject: Welcome to %stores.name%
Body:
We welcome you to %stores.name%.




You can now take part in the various services we have to offer you. Some of these services include:




Permanent Cart - Any products added to your online cart remain there until you remove them, or check them out.


Address Book - We can now deliver your products to another address other than yours! This is perfect to send birthday gifts direct to the birthday-person themselves.


Order History - View your history of purchases that you have made with us.


Products Reviews - Share your opinions on products with our other customers.




For help with any of our online services, please email the store-owner: %email_accounts.Email%.




Note: This email address was provided on our registration page. If you own the email and did not register on our site, please send an email to %email_accounts.Email%.

Name: NEW_FORUM_POST_MESSAGE
Subject: %stores.name%. New Post Notification.
Body:
%stores.name%




A new post has been created in the topic "%forum_topics.TopicName%" at "%forums.ForumName%" forum.




Click here for more info.




Post author: %forum_posts.PostAuthor%


Post body: %forum_posts.PostBody%

Name: NEW_FORUM_TOPIC_MESSAGE
Subject: %stores.name%. New Topic Notification.
Body:
%stores.name%




A new topic "%forum_topics.TopicName%" has been created at "%forums.ForumName%" forum.




Click here for more info.

Name: GIFT_CARD_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %gift_cards.SenderName% has sent you a gift card for %stores.name%
Body:
You have received a gift card for %stores.name%



Dear %gift_cards.RecipientName%,




%gift_cards.SenderName% (%gift_cards.SenderEmail%) has sent you a %gift_cards.Amount% gift card for %stores.name%



Your gift card code is %gift_cards.CouponCode%



%gift_cards.Message%

Name: CUSTOMER_REGISTERED_STORE_OWNER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. New customer registration
Body:
%stores.name%




A new customer registered with your store. Below are the customer's details:


Full name: %customers.first_name% %customers.last_name%


Email: %customers.email%

Name: NEW_RETURN_REQUEST_STORE_OWNER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. New return request.
Body:
%stores.name%




%customers.first_name% %customers.last_name% has just submitted a new return request. Details are below:


Request ID: %ReturnRequest.CustomNumber%


Product: %ReturnRequest.products.Quantity% x Product: %ReturnRequest.products.Name%


Reason for return: %ReturnRequest.Reason%


Requested action: %ReturnRequest.RequestedAction%


Customer comments:


%ReturnRequest.CustomerComment%

Name: DELETE_CUSTOMER_REQUEST_STORE_OWNER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. New request to delete customer (GDPR)
Body: %customers.email% has requested account deletion. You can consider this in the admin area.

Name: NEW_RETURN_REQUEST_CUSTOMER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. New return request.

%stores.name%

Name: NEWSLETTER_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATION_MESSAGE
Subject: %stores.name%. Subscription activation message.
Body:
Click here to confirm your subscription to our list.



If you received this email by mistake, simply delete it.

Name: NEWSLETTER_SUBSCRIPTION_DEACTIVATION_MESSAGE
Subject: %stores.name%. Subscription deactivation message.
Body:
Click here to unsubscribe from our newsletter.



If you received this email by mistake, simply delete it.

Name: NEW_VAT_SUBMITTED_STORE_OWNER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. New VAT number is submitted.
Body:
%stores.name%




%customers.first_name% %customers.last_name% (%customers.email%) has just submitted a new VAT number. Details are below:

Received address: %VatValidationResult.Address%

Name: ORDER_CANCELLED_CUSTOMER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. Your order cancelled
Body:
%stores.name%




Hello %orders.CustomerFullName%,


Your order has been cancelled. Below is the summary of the order.




Order Number: %orders.OrderNumber%


Order Details: %orders.OrderURLForCustomer%


Date Ordered: %orders.CreatedOn%








Billing Address


%orders.BillingFirstName% %orders.BillingLastName%


%orders.BillingAddress1%


%orders.BillingAddress2%


%orders.BillingCity% %orders.BillingZipPostalCode%


%orders.BillingStateProvince% %orders.BillingCountry%








%if (%orders.Shippable%) Shipping Address


%orders.ShippingFirstName% %orders.ShippingLastName%


%orders.ShippingAddress1%


%orders.ShippingAddress2%


%orders.ShippingCity% %orders.ShippingZipPostalCode%


%orders.ShippingStateProvince% %orders.ShippingCountry%




Shipping Method: %orders.ShippingMethod%




endif% %orders.Product(s)%

%stores.name%




Hello %customers.first_name% %customers.last_name%,


New order note has been added to your account:


"%orders.NewNoteText%".


%orders.OrderURLForCustomer%

Name: RECURRING_PAYMENT_CANCELLED_STORE_OWNER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. Recurring payment cancelled
Body:
%stores.name%




%if (%recurring_payments.CancelAfterFailedPayment%) The last payment for the recurring payment ID=%recurring_payments.ID% failed, so it was cancelled. endif% %if (!%recurring_payments.CancelAfterFailedPayment%) %customers.first_name% %customers.last_name% (%customers.email%) has just cancelled a recurring payment ID=%recurring_payments.ID%. endif%

Name: RECURRING_PAYMENT_CANCELLED_CUSTOMER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. Recurring payment cancelled
Body:
%stores.name%




Hello %customers.first_name% %customers.last_name%,


%if (%recurring_payments.CancelAfterFailedPayment%) It appears your credit card didn't go through for this recurring payment (%orders.OrderURLForCustomer%)


So your subscription has been cancelled. endif% %if (!%recurring_payments.CancelAfterFailedPayment%) The recurring payment ID=%recurring_payments.ID% was cancelled. endif%

Name: RECURRING_PAYMENT_FAILED_CUSTOMER_NOTIFICATION
Subject: %stores.name%. Last recurring payment failed
Body:
%stores.name%




Hello %customers.first_name% %customers.last_name%,


It appears your credit card didn't go through for this recurring payment (%orders.OrderURLForCustomer%)

%if (%recurring_payments.RecurringPaymentType% == "Manual")
You can recharge balance and manually retry payment or cancel it on the order history page. endif% %if (%recurring_payments.RecurringPaymentType% == "Automatic")
You can recharge balance and wait, we will try to make the payment again, or you can cancel it on the order history page. endif%

Name: ORDER_PLACED_VENDOR_NOTIFICATION

%stores.name%

Below is the summary of the order.




Order Number: %orders.OrderNumber%


Order Details: %orders.OrderURLForCustomer%

Billing Address

%orders.BillingStateProvince% %orders.BillingCountry%

%orders.ShippingStateProvince% %orders.ShippingCountry%



>Shipping Method: %orders.ShippingMethod%




endif% %orders.Product(s)%
